column4: I've been trying to get a friend to try ubuntu but he says ubuntu "stole" fedora cores theme and painted it brown without giving credit. This is his largest complaint about ubuntu and is a big fedora fan. My question is, is this true or his he crazy? If Ubuntu DID take fedoras style is there some credits page to shoot this argument out of the water?
just ask him for a solid reference, that'll shut him up ;-)
